function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainties surrounding the spread of the virus","Impact":"Potential for uncontrolled spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance, rapid response to outbreaks, and effective communication of accurate information","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, data analysis tools, and communication platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and international travelers","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Closure of entire cities and stringent measures","Impact":"Disruption of daily life, economy, and social infrastructure","Mitigation":"Development of contingency plans, provision of essential services, and support for affected populations","Technologies":"Emergency response systems, remote communication technologies, and crisis management software","People":"Residents, businesses, and essential service providers","Owner":"Local governments, emergency response agencies, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Declaration of a global public health emergency","Impact":"Heightened international alert and response to the outbreak","Mitigation":"Collaboration among countries, coordination of resources, and implementation of global health protocols","Technologies":"Global communication networks, data sharing platforms, and international health surveillance systems","People":"International travelers, global health organizations, and diplomatic missions","Owner":"World Health Organization, national governments, and international health agencies"}]}
